thread.title: Friedhelm Schoenenborn

author: Friedhelm Schoenenborn
title: Friedhelm Schoenenborn
text: Vi was an excellent tour guide. We enjoyed staying with her for more than seven hours. She was flexible (unprevisted school visit), very well informed about her country, "part" of our group, always laughing. the restaurant choice was "super". Teh rikshaw tour -proposed by her- was the highlight for all of us. The name ofour next tour guide in Saigon will be for sure: VI Thanks again to you, VI, from the entire group (7 persons) foe a beautiful day. Friedhelm
